mapper.select: SELECT * FROM areas WHERE sigungu = '999' AND content IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM areas WHERE area = #{area} AND not sigungu in ('999') AND content IS NOT NULL

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO areas(area, sigungu, content) VALUES (#{area}, #{sigungu}, ${content})
